content: The files will be permanently removed from the Trash.

comment.text: This text explains the consequence of permanently deleting files. It appears within a confirmation dialog, informing the user that selected files will be removed from the Trash. Translators should ensure the wording accurately conveys the irreversible nature of the action.

usage.context: <> You are about to move files ({{ filesCount }}) to Trash.{" "} {" "} {t("FilesPermanentlyDeleted")} {t("Common:WantToContinue")} ); } if (foldersCount) {
